title: Who is leading the world in technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Who leads the world in science and technology? [infographic] Many nations help advance scientific knowledge and enhance technological prowess. The United States remains the global leader, but all nations win when knowledge grows

Many of nation have advance scientific knowledge and technology awarness to grow up the technology and science power.United state of AMERICA is the leader in the nation of science and technology buz USA is the nation and global leader,,so it becomes..buz all state win this by advanceing the knowladge and science and technology .
